author: Staff Reporter
text:
A special squad seized Rs.69,700 cash from R. Prasanth of Adimali in Kerala during the routine vehicle check on Theni-Bodi Highway in Bodi near here on Tuesday. The officials said the traveller had carried cash with him during travel without proper documents.

The cash was remitted in the district treasury. Prasanth was going to Kerala from Theni.
title: Special squad seizes cash
